name: Pax Americana
description:
Pax Americana is a Breathless game of Cold War espionage. As an Agent, you will undertake missions that take you across the globe to make the world safe for Uncle Sam.

Travel the world, meet interesting people, kill them–that's your motto.

Use Assets and keep your Heat down. If you succeed, you'll get better.

If you fail–well, let's not worry too much about that.

System: Breathless

Type: Stand-alone game

Genre: Action-adventure

Mechanics: Single die roll using d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d20; possible extra dice.

Intended Players: 3-5 players

Supplies needed: d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d20, character sheets.

Setup time:  30-45 minutes

Session time: 3-4 hours

License: CC-BY 4.0

Included Bonuses: Character sheet.
